query:
SELECT 
  t.nome as tipo_usuario,
  COUNT(p.id) as total_permissoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.visualizar = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_visualizar,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.inserir = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_inserir,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.excluir = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_excluir
FROM tipos_usuario t
LEFT JOIN permissoes p ON p.tipoUsuarioId = t.id
GROUP BY t.id, t.nome
ORDER BY t.nome

  t.nome as tipo_usuario,
  COUNT(p.id) as total_permissoes,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.visualizar = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_visualizar,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.inserir = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_inserir,
  SUM(CASE WHEN p.excluir = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as total_excluir
FROM tipos_usuario t
LEFT JOIN permissoes p ON p.tipoUsuarioId = t.id
GROUP BY t.id, t.nome
ORDER BY t.nome
